text: sab prashansa allaah ke lie hai, jo aakaashon aur dharatee ka paida karanevaala hai. do-do, teen-teen aur chaar-chaar farishton ko baazuonvaalon sandeshavaahak banaakar niyukt karata hai. vah sanrachana mein jaisee chaahata hai, abhivrddhi karata hai. nishchay hee allaah ko har cheez kee saamarthy praapt hai
